SELECT t1.LBD_ID , t1.LBD_LB_ID , t1.LBD_LB_No , t1.LBD_Barcode , t1.LBD_BatchNo , t1.LBD_BatchNoNew , t1.LBD_Name , t1.LBD_Specification , t1.LBD_UOM , t1.LBD_DeliveryQty , T2.SOD_UnitPrice 'LBD_SOD_UnitPrice' , t1.LBD_SignQty , t1.LBD_RejectQty , t1.LBD_LoseQty , t1.LBD_Indemnification , t1.LBD_AccountReceivableAmount , t1.LBD_StatusCode , t1.LBD_StatusName , t1.LBD_Remark , t1.LBD_IsValid , t1.LBD_CreatedBy , t1.LBD_CreatedTime , t1.LBD_UpdatedBy , t1.LBD_UpdatedTime , t1.LBD_VersionNo , t1.LBD_TransID FROM SD_LogisticsBillDetail t1 LEFT JOIN SD_SalesOrderDetail T2 ON T2.SOD_Barcode = t1.LBD_Barcode AND T2.SOD_BatchNo = t1.LBD_BatchNo AND T2.SOD_BatchNoNew = t1.LBD_BatchNoNew WHERE t1.LBD_LB_ID =#WHERE_LBD_LB_ID#;
SELECT T1.LB_ID , T1.LB_VersionNo , T1.LB_AcceptPicPath1 , T1.LB_AcceptPicPath2 , T1.LB_ReceivedPicPath1 , T1.LB_ReceivedPicPath2 FROM SD_LogisticsBill T1 WHERE T1.LB_IsValid = 1 AND ( T1.LB_AcceptPicPath1 = #value# OR T1.LB_AcceptPicPath2 = #value# OR T1.LB_ReceivedPicPath1 = #value# OR T1.LB_ReceivedPicPath2 = #value# )
-- DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.LB_ID) FROM SD_LogisticsBill T1 LEFT JOIN SD_SalesOrder T2 ON T2.SO_No = T1.LB_SourceNo AND T2.SO_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T31.ARB_SrcBillNo , T31.ARB_AccountReceivableAmount , T31.ARB_ReceivedAmount , T31.ARB_UnReceiveAmount FROM FM_AccountReceivableBill T31 WHERE T31.ARB_IsValid = 1 AND T31.ARB_BillDirectName = '正向' AND T31.ARB_SourceTypeName = '销售应收' ) T3 ON T3.ARB_SrcBillNo = T2.SO_No WHERE 1 = 1
T1.LB_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_No#+'%'
T1.LB_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.LB_SourceTypeName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_SourceTypeName#+'%'
T1.LB_SourceNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_SourceNo#+'%'
T1.LB_DeliveryBy LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_DeliveryBy#+'%'
T1.LB_Receiver LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_Receiver#+'%'
T1.LB_StatusName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_StatusName#+'%'
T1.LB_ApprovalStatusName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_ApprovalStatusName#+'%'
T1.LB_IsValid=#WHERE_LB_IsValid#
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , T1.LB_ID , T1.LB_No , T1.LB_Org_ID , T1.LB_Org_Name , T1.LB_SourceTypeCode , T1.LB_SourceTypeName , T1.LB_SourceNo , T1.LB_SourceCode , T1.LB_SourceName , T1.LB_DeliveryByID , T1.LB_DeliveryBy , T1.LB_PhoneNo , T1.LB_AcceptTime , T1.LB_AcceptPicPath1 , T1.LB_AcceptPicPath2 , T1.LB_Receiver , T1.LB_ReceiverAddress , T1.LB_ReceiverPostcode , T1.LB_ReceiverPhoneNo , T1.LB_ReceivedBy , T1.LB_ReceivedTime , T1.LB_ReceivedPicPath1 , T1.LB_ReceivedPicPath2 , T1.LB_Fee , T1.LB_Indemnification , T1.LB_AccountReceivableAmount , T1.LB_PayStautsCode , T1.LB_PayStautsName , T1.LB_StatusCode , T1.LB_StatusName , T1.LB_ApprovalStatusCode , T1.LB_ApprovalStatusName , T1.LB_Remark , T1.LB_IsValid , T1.LB_CreatedBy , T1.LB_CreatedTime , T1.LB_UpdatedBy , T1.LB_UpdatedTime , T1.LB_VersionNo , T3.ARB_ReceivedAmount , T3.ARB_UnReceiveAmount FROM SD_LogisticsBill T1 LEFT JOIN SD_SalesOrder T2 ON T2.SO_No = T1.LB_SourceNo AND T2.SO_IsValid = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T31.ARB_SrcBillNo , T31.ARB_AccountReceivableAmount , T31.ARB_ReceivedAmount , T31.ARB_UnReceiveAmount FROM FM_AccountReceivableBill T31 WHERE T31.ARB_IsValid = 1 AND T31.ARB_BillDirectName = '正向' AND T31.ARB_SourceTypeName = '销售应收' ) T3 ON T3.ARB_SrcBillNo = T2.SO_No WHERE 1 = 1
T1.LB_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_No#+'%'
T1.LB_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.LB_SourceTypeName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_SourceTypeName#+'%'
T1.LB_SourceNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_SourceNo#+'%'
T1.LB_DeliveryBy LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_DeliveryBy#+'%'
T1.LB_Receiver LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_Receiver#+'%'
T1.LB_StatusName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_StatusName#+'%'
T1.LB_ApprovalStatusName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_LB_ApprovalStatusName#+'%'
T1.LB_IsValid=#WHERE_LB_IsValid#
ORDER BY LB_UpdatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY
UPDATE SD_LogisticsBill SET LB_AcceptPicPath1 = #LB_AcceptPicPath1# , LB_AcceptPicPath2 = #LB_AcceptPicPath2# , LB_ReceivedPicPath1 = #LB_ReceivedPicPath1# , LB_ReceivedPicPath2 = #LB_ReceivedPicPath2# , LB_UpdatedTime = GETDATE(), LB_VersionNo = LB_VersionNo+1 WHERE LB_ID = #WHERE_LB_ID#
